- Cleanup on unmount

## Executive Summary

Create the ConfidentialAI service page at `/services/confidential-ai` following the established service page pattern. The page will emphasize data privacy and security for organizations with sensitive data (legal, medical, financial, manufacturing). Key sections include: hero with privacy messaging, deployment options (on-premise, private cloud, air-gapped), industry-specific benefits, security features, and pricing CTA for custom solutions.

## Phase 1: Create ConfidentialAI.jsx Component

### Subtask 1.1: Create the ConfidentialAI.jsx file with full page structure
**File**: `/home/pbrown/aireadypdx/src/pages/services/ConfidentialAI.jsx`
**Pattern**: Follow AIConsulting.jsx structure exactly

**Instructions**:
1. Create new file at `/home/pbrown/aireadypdx/src/pages/services/ConfidentialAI.jsx`
2. Use this template structure:

```jsx
import { useEffect } from 'react'
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'
import { Icons } from '../../components/Icons/Icons'
import './AIConsulting.css'

function ConfidentialAI() {
  const navigate = useNavigate()

  // Set page title and meta description
  useEffect(() => {
    document.title = 'Confidential AI Portland | On-Premise AI for Sensitive Data | AI Ready PDX'

    // Update meta description
    let metaDesc = document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]')
    if (!metaDesc) {
      metaDesc = document.createElement('meta')
      metaDesc.name = 'description'
      document.head.appendChild(metaDesc)
    }
    metaDesc.content = 'On-premise and air-gapped AI solutions for Portland organizations with sensitive data. HIPAA-ready, legal-compliant AI that never leaves your building. 100% data sovereignty.'

    return () => {
      // Reset to default on unmount
      document.title = 'AI Ready PDX | AI Consulting for Portland Businesses'
    }
  }, [])

  const scrollToContact = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    navigate('/#contact')
  }

  const scrollToPricing = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    navigate('/#pricing')
  }

  return (
    <>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      {/* Service Details Section - Deployment Options */}
      {/* Benefits Section - Why On-Premise AI */}
      {/* Industries Section */}
      {/* Security Section */}
      {/* CTA Section */}
      {/* Related Services Section */}
    </>
  )
}

export default ConfidentialAI
```

**Section Content Details**:

**Hero Section**:
```jsx
{/* Hero Section */}
<section className="service-hero confidential-ai-hero">
  <div className="container">
    <div className="service-hero-content">
      <h1>Confidential AI: On-Premise Solutions for Sensitive Data</h1>
      <p className="service-hero-subtitle">
        For organizations with strict data privacy requirements, we deploy AI solutions where your data never leaves your building. Legal, medical, financial, and manufacturing clients trust AI Ready PDX for 100% data sovereignty.
      </p>
      <div className="service-hero-buttons">
        <a href="/#contact" onClick={scrollToContact} className="btn btn-primary btn-large">
          Request a Custom Quote
        </a>
        <a href="/#pricing" onClick={scrollToPricing} className="btn btn-secondary">
          View Pricing Options
        </a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
```

**Service Details - Deployment Options**:
```jsx
{/* Deployment Options Section */}
<section className="service-details">
  <div className="container">
    <div className="section-header">
      <h2>Deployment Options</h2>
      <p>We offer flexible deployment models to match your security requirements and infrastructure.</p>
    </div>
    <div className="service-cards grid-3">
      <div className="card service-card">
        <div className="service-icon">
          <Icons.Lock />
        </div>
        <h3>On-Premise AI Appliances</h3>
        <p>Dedicated AI hardware installed in your facility. Your data never leaves your network, with full control over processing and storage.</p>
        <ul className="service-features">
          <li>Hardware installed on-site</li>
          <li>Complete network isolation</li>
          <li>No external data transmission</li>
          <li>Full administrative control</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
      <div className="card service-card">
        <div className="service-icon">
          <Icons.Shield />
        </div>
        <h3>Private Cloud Inference</h3>
        <p>Dedicated cloud instances with private networking. Enterprise-grade security with the flexibility of cloud infrastructure.</p>
        <ul className="service-features">
          <li>Isolated cloud environment</li>
          <li>Private VPN connectivity</li>
          <li>SOC 2 compliant hosting</li>
          <li>Encrypted data at rest</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
      <div className="card service-card">
        <div className="service-icon">
          <Icons.Building />
        </div>
        <h3>Air-Gapped Solutions</h3>
        <p>Completely disconnected systems for maximum security. Ideal for classified or highly regulated environments.</p>
        <ul className="service-features">
          <li>Zero internet connectivity</li>
          <li>Physical security integration</li>
          <li>Offline model updates</li>
          <li>Audit-ready documentation</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
```

**Industries Section**:
```jsx
{/* Industries We Serve Section */}
<section className="service-process">

        <h3>Medical</h3>
        <p>HIPAA compliance is non-negotiable. We deploy patient-safe AI for clinical documentation, scheduling, and administrative tasks with full audit trails.</p>
      </div>
      <div className="process-step">
        <div className="step-number"><Icons.Building /></div>
        <h3>Financial</h3>
        <p>Protect client financial data and meet SEC, FINRA, and banking regulations. On-premise AI for analysis, reporting, and client communications.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div className="process-steps" style={{marginTop: '2rem'}}>
      <div className="process-step">
        <div className="step-number"><Icons.Factory /></div>
        <h3>Manufacturing</h3>
        <p>Protect proprietary processes, designs, and trade secrets. AI for quality control, predictive maintenance, and supply chain optimization without exposing IP.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
```

**Note**: The "step-number" class is used for styling, but we are putting icons inside. This works because CSS just styles the container. Icons will display inside the circular container.

**Security Section with Image**:

```jsx
// Change FROM:
<Route path="/services/confidential-ai" element={<div className="placeholder-page"><h1>Confidential AI</h1><p>Coming Soon</p></div>} />

// Change TO:
<Route path="/services/confidential-ai" element={<ConfidentialAI />} />
```

```bash
npm run build
```

## Insights & Process Improvements (REQUIRED)

### Issues Encountered During Investigation
1. **No dedicated Server/Database icons**: The Icons component lacks Server, Database, or Cloud icons that would be ideal for this page. Worked around by using Lock, Shield, Building icons which are available and appropriate.
2. **Step-number styling for industries**: The process-steps layout uses numbered steps, but for industries we want icons. The CSS will still work since step-number just styles the circular container - icons will render inside it correctly.

### Input Quality Assessment
**Clarity of Original Request**: 5/5
**Missing Information**: None - the GitHub issue was exceptionally well-written with clear structure, content sources, and acceptance criteria.
**Suggested Input Improvements**: The issue template used here is excellent and should be the standard for future service page issues.

### Process Improvement Suggestions
**For Future Scout-and-Plan Runs**:
1. When creating service pages, always check Icons.jsx first to identify available icons and plan section designs around them.
2. Include line number references from pattern files in the plan for easier Build agent execution.

**For Build Agent**:
1. The industries section uses a second `process-steps` div with inline marginTop style to create a 4th industry (Manufacturing) on a separate row. This is intentional for visual balance.
2. The security section uses inline styles for image sizing - this follows the pattern from App.jsx confidential-ai section.

**For Overall Workflow**:
1. The service page pattern is now well-established across 3 pages. Consider creating a template file or generator script for future service pages to reduce boilerplate.
2. All service pages share AIConsulting.css - if this file grows too large, consider renaming to ServicePages.css for clarity.
